metadata.title: CVE-2018-11408 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The security handlers in the Security component in Symfony in 2.7.x before 2.7.48, 2.8.x before 2.8.41, 3.3.x before 3.3.17, 3.4.x before 3.4.11, and 4.0.x before 4.0.11 have an Open redirect vulnerability when security.http_utils is inlined by a container.  NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2017-16652.

criterions.comment: symfony package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.15+dfsg-2ubuntu4').
